Package suncertify.server

This package holds the classes relevant to the networked aspect of the application, how it is set up and how it is accessed remotely.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBAccessRemote
    This interface is identical to the DBAccess interface except all the methods also throw RemoteException.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientRMIDialog
    This class is used to get RMI details from the user in order to create the required server.
    DataProxy
    This class is used as a wrapper around the DBAccessRemote interface which is used for RMI.
    DataRemote
    This class is used by the client to send requests to the server over RMI.
    NetworkedClient
    This class manages the networked client gui.
    NetworkedServer
    This class manages the setting up of the Server in networked mode.
    ServerClosingHook
    ServerClosingHook class is used to monitor when a virtual-machine shutdown has been initiated.
    ServerRMIDialog
    ServerRMIDialog is used to obtain server settings from end user.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NewRuntimeException
    This exception was created to be thrown by the DataProxy class as an replacement for RemoteException.

Package suncertify.server Description

This package holds the classes relevant to the networked aspect of the application, how it is set up and how it is accessed remotely.
